'''Porto Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Porto was the second child, and youngest son, of [[Posco Baggins]] and [[Gilly Brownlock]]. He was present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>
